Public Delegate Function O365ConnectorCardActionHandler(Of TState)(turnContext As ITurnContext, turnState As TState, query As O365ConnectorCardActionQuery, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
type O365ConnectorCardActionHandler<'State (requires 'State :> TurnState)> = delegate of ITurnContext * 'State * O365ConnectorCardActionQuery * CancellationToken -> Task

Docs.typeparam: Type of the turn state. This allows for strongly typed access to the turn state.

The turn state object that stores arbitrary data for this turn.
The O365 connector card HttpPOST invoke query.
